Errors.Label: CMS engines in meta
Errors.Description: Providing too much information in meta tags can be useful for hackers.

Warnings.Label: CMS or keywords in html stream
Warnings.Description: Providing too much information in HTML stream can be useful for hackers.

Warnings.Label: eval usage
Warnings.Description: The eval function takes a string and passes it to the JavaScript compiler, then executes the resulting byte code.

Warnings.Label: setInterval or setTimeout usage
Warnings.Description: The setInterval() and setTimeout() functions take either a function or a string as their first argument. When a string is provided as the first argument, both of these functions act as eval.

Warnings.Label: console.log usage
Warnings.Description: Consider avoiding console.log with information not useful for end-users.

Warnings.Label: http hyperlink with no SSL
Warnings.Description: Consider avoiding single HTTP links in the page. Prefer using HTTPS.
